title: Andy McDonald – 2021 Comments on Employment Tribunals
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andy McDonald, the Shadow Employment Rights and Protections Secretary, on 11 March 2021.
content:
The Government’s failure to tackle the Employment Tribunal backlog has meant working people are waiting years for justice, leaving them unprotected at a time when they most need protections.
